text: Kelly Osbourne on addiction: 'People need to know rehab doesn't fix you' In the wake of Demi Lovato's suspected overdose, her friend Kelly Osbourne opens up about what she thinks people should know about addiction and relapse.
title: Video Kelly Osbourne on addiction: 'People need to know rehab doesn't fix you'
